content.prompt: Muslim maritime activities in the Indian Ocean would be most disrupted by which of the following <u>sixteenth-century </u>developments?

choices.label: The voyages of Chinese treasure fleets led by Zheng He
The arrival of Portuguese and other Europeans
The growth of the African slave trade

topic.text: 4.2: Exploration - Causes and Events from 1450 to 1750

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
